text:
Chaos in the room, tension thick.  
Raskolnikov struggles to stay upright.  
Nikodim: “What’s this? Are you ill?”  
Head Clerk: “He could hardly hold his pen!”  

---

Raskolnikov, dazed, clutches his hat.  
Ilya: “Have you been ill long?”  
Raskolnikov: “Since yesterday…”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, feeling unwell, is questioned about his whereabouts and condition by Nikodim Fomitch and Ilya Petrovitch after fainting.
